title: Ep. 146: All About Vaginas with Cindy Barshop
itunes:title: Ep. 146: All About Vaginas with Cindy Barshop
itunes:subtitle: Cindy Barshop, founder of V Spot, is here to break taboos about all things below the belt, from vaginal rejuvenation to a shot for better orgasms to—buckle up—anal bleaching. Barshop also spills on what it was really like being a Real Housewife of New ...
description:
Cindy Barshop, founder of V Spot, is here to break taboos about all things below the belt, from vaginal rejuvenation to a shot for better orgasms to—buckle up—anal bleaching. Barshop also spills on what it was really like being a Real Housewife of New York. Before that: Salon owners' current headache; skincare's sexy new texture; and Glossier's big new Play. Also, we're announcing an exciting giveaway from our friends at Ouai! Listen in (and check out our website) for details. 


Want more Fat Mascara?
